imdb.plot outline: BHL (Brampton Hockey League) has been a casual fun Sunday of hockey for friends all over Brampton and the GTA. The Hughes brothers, Allan and Erik, who started the league over 25 years ago, have decided to hold 3 tournaments in their next winter season. Follow the lives of the people who make up this backyard hockey league - from English Professors, to night janitors, girlfriends and wives to audio technicians. Share in the heart break, thrill, and emotions of what makes Canada such a great country. Share in the passion these Canadians bring to the hockey courts.
imdb.title: BHL: Throw the Sticks, Let's Go!
akas: BHL: Throw the Sticks, Let's Go! (Canada)
plot: Brothers, Allan and Erik Hughes, started up a hockey league in a tennis court in the backyard when they were kids. Now, friends from all over have made BHL (Brampton Hockey League) bigger than ever.

BHL (Brampton Hockey League) has been a casual fun Sunday of hockey for friends all over Brampton and the GTA. The Hughes brothers, Allan and Erik, who started the league over 25 years ago, have decided to hold 3 tournaments in their next winter season. Follow the lives of the people who make up this backyard hockey league - from English Professors, to night janitors, girlfriends and wives to audio technicians. Share in the heart break, thrill, and emotions of what makes Canada such a great country. Share in the passion these Canadians bring to the hockey courts.
